title: I_Anime
author: I_Anime
content: This literally the first halving I'm going to experience since knowing about bitcoin. So I've already started holding Bitcoin and lately the progression  has been going well!!.So I've some Lil funds with me but I'm thinking of which good altcoins I can hold for the upcoming  halving, that's going to also skyrocket too. I was thinking about ETH, BNB and SOL. But still, I  need recommendations from you guys about the best altcoins to hold for the halving please.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: That depends on what kind of return you would like to get in long term or short term. If you can take risk then look into meme coins, otherwise look for layer two projects that are making big difference. Meme coins are for short term gain if you can hold them for 180 days. Layer 2 project for a long term gain for about 2 years. Before making any investment always do your own research and don't follow anyone blindly.

comments.author: Cvetik56
comments.body: There are hundreds of options. I'm just gonna focus on ETH now, I think it's a solid choice.

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: It would be something which we have to take spontaneous call because no one can predict which altcoins would hit gold during halving but one thing is sure that we will see whole new set of altcoins which were not part of bull rally last time. But if you want to play safe then there is no safer option that ETH when it comes to altcoin, though the growth wouldn't match up to other altcoins which will rise and fall during this period but ETH will have extended bullish run like we witnessed during 2018. Better to monitor the market rigorously and take the right call at the right movement and stick to the principle of risk management as well by using stop loss and take profits effectively.It won't be same coins like BNB, SOL and etc.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: I_Anime on December 04, 2023, 07:25:11 AMI was thinking about ETH, BNB and SOL. But still, I  need recommendations from you guys about the best altcoins to hold for the halving please. You already made the right choice to hold those reputable coin but if i were you I don't mind still doing DCA to accumulate more bitcoin before comes the halving if you are only concerned about the profits that is come during process.ETH BNB MATIC seems very cool with me but if you don't mind I will always tell an altcoin investors not to hold for long because the lost after halving are always not bearable, to remain at the safer side learn to keep increasing your portfolio before next year.

comments.body: Quote from: I_Anime on December 04, 2023, 07:25:11 AMI'm thinking of which good altcoins I can hold for the upcoming  halving, that's going to also skyrocket too. I was thinking about ETH, BNB and SOL. But still, I  need recommendations from you guys about the best altcoins to hold for the halving please. Any altcoins in general will sky rocket but your safe choice will be the next altcoin to Bitcoin when it comes to marketcap. You can use coinmarketcap or coingecko to check altcoins ranking and purchase the top altcoin to have a better chance that it will pump along with Bitcoin in long term.Just remember that altcoin pump usually delayed when Bitcoin is rallying hard but it will follow later on once Bitcoin dominance already weaken.

comments.body: Quote from: I_Anime on December 04, 2023, 07:25:11 AMThis literally the first halving I'm going to experience since knowing about bitcoin. While bitcoin will keep its momentum high before and after bitcoin halving, some highly potential altcoins will do the same. However, I can't pinpoint which will be the most profitable altcoin that will go along with bitcoin this time, but if you want to play safe and invest safe, I suggest that you prioritize ethereum over other altcoins. Ethereum is next to bitcoin when it comes to its security, although some random altcoins may offer bigger profits than ethereum at some point.As always, research is the key. Don't just jump to investing, but know first the background and history of every coin because that could also help in determining which coin is safe to invest.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: I recommend XRP and BNB because they are the most controversial coins nowadays and yet they are surviving their own battle as if it's not there also they are at their cheap rate right now which gives you good profit and security because these coins have already established their proofs of reliability and you don't need to worry about investing your money with their coins because they are not like the other new coins that were only created to pump and dump and lure their victims and run away when they got their money.

comments.body: Quote from: I_Anime on December 04, 2023, 07:25:11 AMThis literally the first halving I'm going to experience since knowing about bitcoin. If you plan to hold long term, it would be okay to go with any coin you believe would work. But if you plan to hold for selling around the next halving, you should consider investing on the altcoins that haven't had a significant price boost last too months. One of them is Litecoin, they haven't increased more and whales are accumulating it. Another option is BNB, with the controversy around binance, it could stay low for further 3 months but the current price is good enough to start accumulating.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Well, Ethereum is also increasing in value and I guess Bitcoin has a lot to do with that. Most of the time that coin is being pulled up by Bitcoin whenever it is pumped. That's your best next choice if you are looking for altcoins. I'd choose BNB next to it, I actually have some of it in my stash just to be ready in case a pump happens again and if it will also be pulled up. BNB has a working project and it helps traders to have a cheaper trading fee so most likely there's a high usage of the coin which is why its value sticks with 3 digits. I'd stick with those three for now. I lack funds to buy others and I am trying to just focus on Bitcoin for now. Many things are about to happen so it's a good thing to hoard as much as possible in the legal way. ETF is just around the corner, halving is also happening, and so it means more eyes will be on Bitcoin and maybe more investors will come and buy to avoid being in FOMO.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: If you don't have confident in any of the altcoins then you can leave or you invest all the money in bitcoin and relax. But if you like to diversify your investment then first you have to know that there is risk in altcoins than bitcoin and as you mentioned Ethereum, BNB and USDT are some of top altcoins alongside with bitcoin which one can invest to see in the coming bull market. I have not heard of SOL coin so I can't recommend that for you. But if you know it very well and you know that it will not disappoint you in the future and it will appreciate in the future even not in this coming bull market but later in the years it will make some value in the ecosystem then you are free to invest in it.There are sometimes you follow your instincts to invest or do something and not necessarily that you must follow people opinion. General opinion in some cases might even confused you what to do so follow your mind.

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: You are experiencing first halving because bitcoin was not much famous in past as that is in present so I think that numerous individuals will have first experience. As the market is going up so it is assumed that coming halving will be more stronger than previous and the price of bitcoin will attain the value of more than 70k$ as present value is 42k$. Altcoins which you have mentioned will definitely gives your highest amount of profit but the main thing is understanding of actual timing of selling because if you wait more and more and don't get your benefit then there is a chance that even valuable altcoins cannot give you profit.

comments.body: Quote from: yazher on December 04, 2023, 12:42:38 PMI recommend XRP and BNB because they are the most controversial coins nowadays and yet they are surviving their own battle as if it's not there also they are at their cheap rate right now which gives you good profit and security because these coins have already established their proofs of reliability and you don't need to worry about investing your money with their coins because they are not like the other new coins that were only created to pump and dump and lure their victims and run away when they got their money.XRP can be a good investment, provided its issues with Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) are settled in a win win situation, and it is mostly anticipated. comments.author: tjtonmoy
comments.body: I am not against altcoins but just to be on the safe side, they are not that good for hodling for a longer period of time. The thing with altcoin is that they pump in price with hype and trends. Bitcoin halving is a great thing for those altcoins to get a decent pump but that's just it. After that is over, it will kiss the ground in no time. Some will survive but hard to tell which one it's going to be. Not to mention that they are all centralized. So whatever you do, learn to read the hype, trend and market pattern. Then you can have a decent profit out of it. One advice from me is that it's Bitcoin halving. So focus more on BTC. ALtcoin season comes after the BTC pump. Make a good profit from BTC then use that profit to make more profits from altcoins. More profits means you can take more risks and diversify your investment

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: Cvetik56 on December 04, 2023, 08:43:15 AMThere are hundreds of options. I'm just gonna focus on ETH now, I think it's a solid choice.Much better choice to stick only to one or to a very few of it where you'll be able to feel the true impact of the volatility and price movements. Because if it's too scattered in so many altcoins, and you only have got hundreds to invest. There's still some gains but the impact will be little because the other altcoins that you might choose could be dropping.While some of yours are pumping. That's why this is a sound plan and as no argument needed, ETH is one of the best choice.
